name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Software Developer with 8 years of expertise in building high-performance applications utilizing **Kotlin**, **Spring Boot**, **Java**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Python**. Proficient in developing scalable solutions with **Golang** and **Vue 3**, leveraging AI-assisted development tools to enhance productivity. I have substantial experience in integrating e-commerce platforms like **Shopify**, **Magento**, and **WooCommerce**, along with developing robust ERP and PIM systems.
My strong background in data processing and cloud services allows me to contribute effectively to remote teams by ensuring clear communication and collaboration. I am known for my curiosity and initiative, combined with a structured and self-driven approach to project management, ensuring timely and high-quality delivery of solutions. I have successfully led initiatives that incorporate modern technologies and compliant standards in various sectors, achieving significant project milestones and enhancing overall system efficiency.
